input.sentences: we took a family trip to the snow last weekend .
all the kids were excited and running to get their sleds .
the older family decided to walk their happy dogs instead .
i took a family photo with my parents and sisters .
in the end | we had a great meal together .
output.sentences: Everyone is getting ready for a day in the snow.
Running outside, everyone is excited for the first major snowfall of the season.
Walking the dogs, everyone is happy to get ouside.
Finding a fun sign, the parents and siblings take a photo.
After romping through the snow, everyone warms up with a nice hot meal.
